sentences.en: a castle set on a crag above the village
sentences.cn: 位于村子上方悬崖上的城堡

sentences.en: A sneak peak back at the fall and surrounding crag was rewarded with an adrenaline rush.
sentences.cn: 即使对瀑布和林立的峭壁的一瞥都令我不寒而栗.

sentences.en: And all but cry with colour! That gaunt crag.
sentences.cn: 且尽都褪色号哭! 那荒芜的峭壁.

sentences.en: He nourished him with honey from the rock, and with oil from the flinty crag.
sentences.cn: 又使他从磐石中咂蜜,从坚石中吸油.

sentences.en: Shan Meilin is dense , the skillful crag grows thickly, pleasant weather.
sentences.cn: 山美林密,巧岩丛生, 气候宜人.

sentences.en: She was huddled in a crag lee side of a mountain, almost frozen, very near death.
sentences.cn: 她蜷缩在山脚处一块岩石下避风, 浑身冰冷, 奄奄一息了.

sentences.en: The despairing man jumped off the crag.
sentences.cn: 那个绝望的人跳下了悬崖.

sentences.en: The Maochang town dog crag village children always appeared in his mind.
sentences.cn: 猫场镇狗吊岩村孩子们的眼光一直在他脑海中闪现.

sentences.en: The newspaper interviewed the crag yesterday, has understood some Liu Yan recent situation.
sentences.cn: 本报昨天采访了刘岩, 了解了一些刘岩的近况.

sentences.en: The towering crag looks rather perilous , exactly like a huge python breaking out of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 顶部扁平,颈部稍细,最细处直径约7米,状极突兀,形似一硕大蟒蛇破山而出, 直欲腾空而去.

sentences.en: They surmount one crag after another.
sentences.cn: 他们登上一块又一块的峭壁.

trans.tran_en: a high and very steep rough rock or mass of rocks
